title: Good at Teaching?
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Dia-san, I’d like to ask you something.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>What may it be, Shizuku-san? Do you need to observe me again as a reference for a play?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>This time, it’s umm.... I want you to teach me volleyball.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh? Volleyball? I’m not exactly an expert myself, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Does the ball ever hit you in the face, Dia-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Well, I don’t think so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Then you’ll do. I’m going to be a libero in the next match, so I want to be able to make good serves. Please help me....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Okay, I understand. I don’t know if I can meet your expectations, Shizuku-san, but if you want me to, I’d be happy to help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you very much!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Your waist is too high! Open up your legs more and keep your center low! Face towards the ball!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>H-, hieeeh! She’s way stricter than I thought~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
